h3_title: Yoaguai Chief - Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind
content: When Quick as Fire is down, the intensity of Fast as Wind's attacks will increase. He'll now start to charge at you, sweeping down as close as possible to the ground, to hit you with his tusks. The best counter to this is a dodge, which will see him hit the ground and get his tusks stuck for a few seconds.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Quick as Fire, Fast as Wind'.
The content is as follows:
When Quick as Fire is down, the intensity of Fast as Wind's attacks will increase. He'll now start to charge at you, sweeping down as close as possible to the ground, to hit you with his tusks. The best counter to this is a dodge, which will see him hit the ground and get his tusks stuck for a few seconds.
